name: The prismatic belt of rainbow colors
data: It has magnificent armour class for its type (pathetic in general).
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
The prismatic belt allows the wearer to 'allocate' stat points.
The wearer can use 'allocate <stat> <#> to shift the stat
bonuses of the belt around.  If the wearer wishes to reset the
maximum stats of the belt, he can grant negative stats.  The belt
never grants more than 20 in any given stat except strength,
which has a much lower statmax.   The wearer can 'belt_display'
to show how many stats the belt is currently granting.
